text: Mr. Wu is a 1919 British drama movie directed by Maurice Elvey and was based on the 1913 play of the same name by Maurice Vernon and Harold Owen. It stars Matheson Long, Lillah McCarthy, Meggie Albanesi, Roy Royston, Teddy Arundell and was remade in 1927 as Mr. Wu. ==Other websites== * Category:1919 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:British silent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Maurice Elvey
title: Mr. Wu (1919 movie)
